title: [Epidemiology] Life expectancy in the U.S. increased during a span of 20yrs, but widespread gaps among racial and ethnic groups exist: From 2000-2019 overall life expectancy in the United States increased by 2.3 years, but the increase was not consistent among racial and ethnic groups and by geographic area.
[Health] Lysosome lipid signalling from the periphery to neurons regulates longevity
